results.name: Difference in number of prime factors (when counted with multiplicity) between GF(2)[X] (carryless binary) and ordinary factorization: a(n) = A091222(n) - A001222(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences operating on polynomials in ring GF(2)[X]
formula: For all n, a(A091206(n)) = 0. [Note that zeros occur in other positions as well.]
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 10 2018
